title: Watch: Wout van Aert Nearly Wipes Out in Roubaix Recon, Red Bull’s Wacky Ride
content:
Van Aert finally gets lucky, Luke Lamperti tapped for Paris-Roubaix debut, dust bowl expected for women's race Saturday: 'It's going to be a very fast race.'

Read the full article at Watch: Wout van Aert Nearly Wipes Out in Roubaix Recon, Red Bull’s Wacky Ride on Velo.
author: ahood
